title: Moscow Airport Sells for Half Off, a Sign of Russia’s Global Isolation
summary_full: The government opened the sale to cut-rate bidding for Domodedovo Airport after it received no offers at its initial asking price of $1.7 billion.
summary_public: The government opened the sale to cut-rate bidding for Domodedovo Airport after it received no offers at its initial asking price of $1.7 billion.
